item.title: Your Focus in the Storm
item.description: When we are in crisis it can be hard to keep our focus in a healthy place. If we let our thoughts run wild, our fear can overwhelm us. But the Bible lets us know where our focus should lie. Focus on Jesus We look away from the natural realm and we fasten our gaze onto Jesus who birthed faith within us and who leads us forward into faithâ€™s perfection.
